George Abbott https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Abbott 0 George Francis Abbott (June 25, 1887 – January 31, 1995) was an American theater producer and director, playwright, screenwriter, and film director and producer whose career spanned nine decades. George_Francis_Abbott ( June_25_,_1887 – January_31_,_1995 ) was an_American_theater_producer_and_director , playwright , screenwriter , and film_director_and_producer whose_career spanned nine_decades .
